actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: To restore the prohibition against all racial discrimination in the making and enforcement of contracts, including surety contracts.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends provisions of existing law relating to equal rights under the law to specifically include within the right to make and enforce contracts the making, performance, modification, and termination of contracts, including surety contracts, and the enjoyment of all benefits, privileges, terms, and conditions of the contractual relationship.

titles.title: To restore the prohibition against all racial discrimination in the making and enforcement of contracts, including surety contracts.
